result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix

records.addlTxt: Status conference on January 20, 2023 at 11:30 am.

9:42 AM Defendant Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix.  Attorney Aleksandra Hodowany in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at. Atty Viel  waives formal reading of amended complaint and information, enters not guilty plea.  Atty Viel requests another date. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for January 20, 2023 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on October 17, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Court addresses motion for bond modification.  Defense requests cash bond be amended.  State objects. Court denies request.  Bond remains as previously set.

11:12 AM Defendant Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix in court, in custody. Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Viel requests status in 60 days. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Defendant's Motion to Modify Bond
DC Jail Request for Sentence Modification - Defendant requests cash bond reduction to $2,000.          Denied.  Bond modification request on 7/07/22 was denied.  Bond still $3,000 cash.  DTE
Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 11:15 am.

Atty Viel requests cash bond be reduced, indicates defendant does plan to stay in the area for employment and not return to the State of Ohio any time soon.  State opposes request, gives argument on bond.  Court makes statement, denies defendants request for bond modification.  Bond remains in effect as previously set.
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Atty Viel would like to argue bond.

9:02 AM  Defendant Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix in court, in custody.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Dep. Andrew Janikowski sworn, testifies. Cross by Atty Viel.   Court finds probable cause that felony was committed and probable cause that defendant committed that felony and binds over for further proceedings.
Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 11:15 am.
from Pati Wolfe to Court
from defendant to Court.      Can address on 7/7/22. DTE
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on July 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant was fingerprinted 5/31/22.

10:59 AM  Defendant Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix appeared by video from the Door County Jail.   Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.    Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at re: SPD appointing counsel  Atty Viel advises he will be representing defendant.  Defense waives reading of the complaint, waives time limits for prelim.  Atty Viel puts State on notice that they'd like to argue bail at the next hearing.  Set for prelim. Atty Viel to set prelim. date with JA Parks after todays hearing.  Bond remains in effect.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:08 AM Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix appeared by video from the Brown County Jail.  Court reviews events in file, indicates defendant did send up a petition for appointment of counsel form for court to review. Upon review of that form, defendant is no longer working and was advised to contacted SPD office to see if he now qualifies for their representation.  Per Kylie at SPD office, defendant did contact their office this morning and now qualifies for SPD representation.  Atty Viel had indicated between hearings that his office needed to do a conflicts check before appointing counsel, requested AIA be set.  Bond remains in effect.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Defendant not employed. Court requests defendant contact SPD to see if he now qualifies for their representation.
records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on June 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:06 AM  Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel, right to prelim.  Defendant indicates he doesn't qualify for SPD representation.  Court explains options regarding legal counsel to defendant.  Court will send petition for appointment of attorney from down to the jail for defendant to fill out.  Court reschedules matter for next week.  Bond remains in effect.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. Alcohol Monitoring - High Level.   Do not operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license and subject to any conditions or restrictions on that license.  Maintain absolute sobriety. No presence in bars, taverns, liquor stores or any establishment whose primary purpose is the sale and/or consumption of alcohol except for employment purposes. Not to possess or consume any alcohol.

1:00 PM   Defendant Tomas Aquino Velazquez Felix appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. State gives incident report, potential charges. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history, reviews right to Counsel. Court finds probable cause, sets bond. Return 6/06/22 at 10:00 am.
